title: At a Trump rally in Pennsylvania, Mastriano imagines his first day in office.
description: “On Day 1, woke is broke,” Doug Mastriano, the far-right Republican in the Pennsylvania governor’s race, told the crowd.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender

media:content.media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Doug Mastriano at a rally with former President Donald J. Trump on Saturday in Latrobe, Pa.
